snippet.title: PAYDAY 2: The Goat Simulator Heist Trailer
snippet.description:
This is Going to be a Weird One, Gang.

The Goat Simulator Heist will be available on January 14!

www.overkillsoftware.com/games/goat/

The Goat Simulator Heist DLC - $6.99

-        A new 2-day heist
-        1 new shotgun secondary weapon
-        4 melee weapons
-        4 masks
-        4 patterns
-        4 materials
-        5 new achievements
-        2 new songs by Simon Viklund
